summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3837 for the improvement of 36th Avenue Northeast, from East 55th Street to East 65th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 47126, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
